tweet: When it comes to dieting for fat loss, I’m just like you—and I always have been.
On February 18th, 2003 I set out to achieve a very real, personal goal of mine to get into the best physical shape of my life.
For at least a week prior, I sat there and meticulously mapped out every single item I planned to eat over the course of the next 12 weeks.
The end result? Exactly what you would expect to see in a “solid” fat-loss nutrition program...
Plenty of fruit, veggies, lean protein, and healthy fat.
